alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Cook (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 12:06AM EDT until July 22 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cook County in south central Georgia... Berrien County in south central Georgia... * Until 1245 AM EDT. * At 1205 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Omega, or 9 miles south of Tifton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Adel, Sparks, Enigma, Ray City, Lenox, Cecil, Reed Bingham State Park, Cottle, Cook Co A/P, Staunton, Berrien Co A/P, New Lois, Massee, Barneyville, Greggs, Pine Valley, Flat Ford, Wagon Wheel and Allenville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
